Name: Horny Heart
About the game: Horny heart New stunning shooting gallery with gachi elements - 'Horny heart'! 'Horny heart' is a beautiful and active animated game in which you have to play shooting gallery, in order to try to beat out several beautiful girls in roulette. And also open several animations for them. This is an active and addictive game that will not let you get bored. In the game you have to open several girls and then open the animation for them. 'Horny heart' consists of two elements, first you score points in the dash, which are converted into gold. And after that, the gachi element is turned on. You will have to spend the earned coins in order to spin the roulette wheel and try to get images of girls, hearts for opening animations, or at least some more gold. Features of the game: - Beautiful scenes with multiple girls. - Each girl has her own animation. - Nice sound and visual effects. - Dash mode and roulette mode. - Gallery with hot animated scenes that you will discover in roulette. Beautiful graphics, stunning animated scenes with several hot girls, and the game is very easy to play – this is all you need to know about 'Horny heart'. And now, stop waiting, it's time to play 'Horny heart' and discover new girls for the gallery! Всем персонажам больше 20 лет. TradingCards TradingCards will be added as soon as Valve grants us access to them!
